definition: to widen a tube/to ream (i.e. widen a hole)

sentences.english: This drill having balanced 3 flutes is suitable for precision drilling without reaming.
sentences.chinese: 具有对称的3个排屑槽，适用于扩孔，不需要较孔。

sentences.english: The reasonable loading structure and reaming blasting are expou…
sentences.chinese: 阐述高台阶爆破的合理装药结构，以及扩孔爆破问题。

sentences.english: Care must be taken when drilling so as not to drill too far, thus penetrating the far cortex.
sentences.chinese: 扩孔时应十分小心，以避免扩孔过头而穿透对侧皮质。

sentences.english: Care must be taken when drilling so as not to drill too far, thus penetrating the far cortex.
sentences.chinese: 扩孔时应十分小心，以避免扩孔过头而穿透对侧皮质。

sentences.english: The reaming drill bit in slim hole is a key tools of re-drilling in existing well.
sentences.chinese: 小井眼扩孔钻头是老井重钻的关键设备。

sentences.english: The jar can be reamed and used again.
One technique is to use power reaming to penetrate the first cortex and then switch to hand reaming.
sentences.chinese: 可以用电钻突破第一层皮质，然后换成手摇钻扩孔。

definition: to bore a hole/to drill/drilled hole
external diameter (including thickness of the wall)
bolt (male component of nut and bolt)/screw
to straighten/(fig.) to mend one's ways
